official_title: A bill to release the State of Ohio and the Ohio Turnpike Commission from restrictions with respect to the imposition and collection of tolls on the Ohio Turnpike.

summary.text: Releases Ohio and the Ohio Turnpike Commission from all restrictions with respect to the imposition and collection of tolls or other charges on the Ohio Turnpike.

titles.title: A bill to release the State of Ohio and the Ohio Turnpike Commission from restrictions with respect to the imposition and collection of tolls on the Ohio Turnpike.
